casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Harold BOYD, Jr. No. 239P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 30, 2005. Daniel P. O'Brien, Assistant Attorney General, Ben David, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th day of May 2005 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Discretionary Review and Supporting Affidavit:

"Motion Dismissed ex mero motu. By order of the Court in conference this the 30th day of June 2005."
